meanings.definition: To spread out or extend in all directions.
meanings.sent1: The tree's branches were outspreading across the sky.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys outspreading a picnic blanket in the park.
meanings.sent3: The outspreading of the frosting on the cake made it look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: His kindness outspreads like ripples in a pond, touching everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The outspreading of the wildfire was a frightening sight.

meanings.definition: The act of spreading out or extending in all directions.
meanings.sent1: The outspreading of the map revealed hidden treasures.
meanings.sent2: The outspreading of the wings signaled the bird's takeoff.
meanings.sent3: The outspreading of laughter in the room was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The outspreading of the news spread quickly through the town.
meanings.sent5: The outspreading of the crowd made it hard to see the stage.
